name: One Thousand Times Alone
description:
You find yourself stranded in a strange place, surrounded by menacing creatures. Finding a way out is possible, but it won't be easy. Who knows what kind of monsters lurk these old caves? Hopefully you can find something to defend yourself with...

A game heavily inspired by the original Metroid as well as other Metroidvania titles.

Featuring-- The protagonist

Hey, that's you! A capable astronaut(???) who finds themselves in a strange cave. Not particularly well equipped, but very adaptable. Luckily there are a wide variety of tools strewn throughout the caverns.

Instructions:

1. Download file

2.Unzip file

3.Run metroidvania.exe

4. If/when Windows Smartscreen yells at you for running an .exe file, click more info & then run anyways

--created for the "I can't draw but want to make a game" jam & the "Metroidvania Month no. 8" jam
